JOB_NAME_PATTERN_MISMATCH_WARNING: Only lower case alphanumeric, '_' and '-' allowed.
JOB_NAME_LENGTH_WARNING: Job name must be between 4 and 100 characters.
SERVER_ERROR_SHORT: The server encountered an internal error.
SERVER_ERROR_LONG: Internal server error. Try again or contact the system administrator.
JOB_USED_IN_EXECUTION: This job is currently active. Wait for execution to finish and try again.
